scale.description: This indicates that the custom resource should serve a `/scale` subresource that returns an `"autoscaling/v1"` Scale object.

status.description: This indicates the custom resource should serve a `/status` subresource. When enabled, requests to the custom resource primary endpoint ignore changes to the `status` stanza of the object, requests to the custom resource `/status` subresource ignore changes to anything other than the `status` stanza of the object.
